amendatorysection.para: The department shall file an annual report with the Governor and the Clerk of the Legislature on or before January 1 of each year beginning January 1, 1983. Such report shall include:

(1) The number of families and disabled persons applying for support pursuant to sections 68-1501 to 68-1519 and the number of families and disabled persons receiving support pursuant to sections 68-1501 to 68-1519;
(2) The types of services and programs being applied for and those being provided through sections 68-1501 to 68-1519;
(3) The effects of the support provided under sections 68-1501 to 68-1519 on the disabled and their families; and
(4) Any proposals for amendment of sections 68-1501 to 68-1519.
